import React from "react"; export default function Products() { const images = [ "JendycoFields1.jpg", "Jendycoffee-Branch2.JPG", "Jendycoffee-branch.JPG", "Jendycocoffeebeans-closeup.JPG", "JendycoCoffee-Branch3.JPG", "JendycoCacao-Branch3.JPG", "JendycoCacao-Branch2.JPG", "JendycoCacao-Branch.JPG", ]; return (
{/* Header Section */}

PRODUCTS

{/* Featured Products */}
{/* Coffee */}

Coffee Beans

Our Arabica coffee is handpicked from high-altitude Peruvian farms, delivering rich, smooth flavors for premium roasters worldwide. With ethical sourcing and meticulous quality control, Jendyco coffee sets the global standard.

{/* Cacao */}

Cacao Beans

Our cacao beans are sourced from lush valleys of Peru, prized for their deep chocolate notes and exceptional purity. We serve international chocolatiers with unmatched consistency and transparency.

{/* Pima Cotton */}

Pima Cotton

Pima cotton is Peru's luxurious natural fiber, known for its softness, durability, and sustainability. Jendyco partners directly with family growers to bring this textile treasure to global manufacturers.

{/* Gallery */}

In the Field

{images.map((img, index) => (
))}
); }
